name: One Must Go
description:
Ludum Dare 43 Jam

This was created for the LDJam 43. The theme was Sacrifices must be made

Idea

Four survivors in the cabin. One must be sacrificed.

Here is some todo-list that was in idea to have, but because the jam.. there were not enough time.

  • Different characters have different features:
    • speed
    • health
    • weapon
    • knowledge
  • Random escape plans
  • Sounds
  • Music
  • Portrait pictures of each character
What?

Like always in the game jam, the time is the "enemy". Lots of features thought that I didn't have enough time to implement. Maybe finishing the game after the jam to have all the features.

Credits

Voxel models created by mysterious KS!

Tools/Assets
  • Used Unity 2018
  • Bolt for visual scripting
  • TextMesh Pro for texts
  • ProBuilder for cabin
